LanguageData.RMTS.traitsMin: Minimum Number of Traits Per Pawn
LanguageData.RMTS.traitsMax: Maximum Number of Traits Per Pawn
LanguageData.RMTS.SmallFont: Use Small Font for Traits List.
LanguageData.RMTS.SmallFontTip: The normal font used for the traits list on the character tab will allow up to seven traits to be seen. If this is checked, a smaller font will be used, allowing up to nine traits to be displayed.
LanguageData.RMTS.traitsNotes:
Important Notes:
Changes you make here will not actually take effect until you've restarted the game.
If you set the maximum number of traits lower than the minimum, your mistake will automatically be corrected, with the maximum being reset to equal the minimum.
Be aware that even if you set the maximum number of traits to zero, some pawns will still show up with traits, since some backgrounds force traits to be assigned.
